resources.string: Choose position of where you want to see the Android Wear card for C.Y.P.O.
We have noticed that a new wear device has been connected to the app. Please click the card to manage this new device.

%1$s
Number of times you have turned your device on.

%2$s
Number of times you have unlocked your device.

%3$s
Duration your device has been on for.

%1$s
Number of times your watch has been turned on.

%2$s
Duration your watch has been on for.

%1$s you turned your device on %2$d times, which is the most since installing the app.

The longest you had used the device for was on %3$s where you managed to use it for %4$s.
\nShows information from the time the application was installed.

On %1$s, you turned your device on %2$d times, which is the most for the month!

The longest you have used your device for the month was on %3$s where you used it for %4$s.
So far you have turned on your device %1$d times, unlocked it %2$d times and used it for %3$s.
Your watch has been turned on %1$d times and used for %2$s.

This week on %1$s you turned your device on the most, having turned it on %2$d times.

On %3$s, you used the phone for %4$s, which is the most this week!
Yesterday you turned your device on %1$d times, unlocked it %2$d times and used it for %3$s.
Your watch was turned on %1$d times and used for %2$s.
On %1$s you managed to get %2$s of on screen time. That is the most you got from your battery on a single charge!
%1$s times you turned your device on yesterday! That\'s the most since the installation of C.Y.P.O :)
That\'s how many times you turned your device on yesterday!
The device was not turned on yesterday, please use me :(
\nShows the maximum screen on time on a single charge.
C.Y.P.O can only support one Android Wear device at a time. If you have more than one Android Wear device, please select the one you would like to use with this application.
Note: This does not affect the application running on Android Wear. This is a limitation currently with the Phone/Tablet applications.

Version: 1.0.20160124

Developer: Richard Tan

Website: Just Experiment - CYPO

Donate: PayPal.me/RichardTan

GitHub: GitHub

C.Y.P.O (Check your phone often) is an app that will keep track of the number of times you turn on your phone, tablet or watch. Just leave it running in the background and you will get daily notification of how often you turn your devices on.

If you have an Android Wear device, please make sure you open the app on the watch so that it will be able to run in the background.

Click Here to dismiss this message
